Package common.test

Class MultipleChoiceQuestion

java.lang.Object
common.test.Question
common.test.MultipleChoiceQuestion
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class MultipleChoiceQuestion
extends Question
Represents a question for which the user can select one (or more) answers from a list
See Also:
Serialized Form

      public MultipleChoiceQuestion​(java.lang.String question, int associatedPoints, MultipleChoiceAnswer... answers)
      Creates a new MultipleChoiceQuestion
      Parameters:
      question - the question which will be prompted to the user
      associatedPoints - the number of points associated with this question
      answers - the possible answers to the question
